scripts.contracts:coverage:core: cd contracts && /home/darthgawd/.config/.foundry/bin/forge coverage --report lcov && cd .. && node scripts/check-core-coverage.js
scripts.contracts:deploy: bash -c 'set -a && source .env && set +a && cd contracts && /home/darthgawd/.config/.foundry/bin/forge script script/Deploy.s.sol:DeployFalken --rpc-url $RPC_URL --broadcast'
scripts.contracts:deploy:dice: bash -c 'set -a && source .env && set +a && cd contracts && /home/darthgawd/.config/.foundry/bin/forge script script/DeploySimpleDice.s.sol:DeploySimpleDice --rpc-url $RPC_URL --broadcast'
